original_text: Howbeit Sisera fled away on his feet to the tent of Jael the wife of Heber the Kenite: for there was peace between Jabin the king of Hazor and the house of Heber the Kenite.
korean_text: 시스라가 걸어서 도망하여 겐 사람 헤벨의 아내 야엘의 장막에 이르렀으니 이는 하솔 왕 야빈과 겐 사람 헤벨의 집 사이에는 화평이 있음이라

sentences.original_text: Howbeit Sisera fled away on his feet
the wife of Heber the Kenite:
between Jabin the king of Hazor
and the house of Heber the Kenite.
